p: Anogeissus leiocarpa belonging to the family of Combretaceae is also called "Idi Ayin" among the Yoruba people of Nigeria. It is a deciduous plant indigenous to the savannas of tropical Africa. It is also referred to as African birch. A.Â leiocarpa's root and bark are used traditionally in the treatment of cough, gonorrhea, asthma, tuberculosis.
